contentList.content: Forged amidst seething flames, it allows the wearer to channel the mighty essence of ancient dragons. This power empowers them with the ability to command and wield the potent might of dragons, transforming them into a formidable force on the battlefield.

A potent creation of a reclusive sect of blood mages who coveted mastery over the forbidden magic of life force and death's embrace. This ring bestows upon its wearer the ability to manipulate blood and unleash formidable spells upon their foes. However, with forbidden magic, nothing comes without a cost. Wield it wisely.

A relic of the night. Shrouds its wearer in veils of darkness, granting the gift of silent movement and the power to catch foes off guard, making it the ideal tool for those who thrive in the shadows.

A revered relic hailing from a long-forgotten era when peace reigned between the realms of light and dark, it was crafted by ancient beings who sought to harmonize these contrasting forces. Allows its wearer to harness both radiant and shadowy energies, enabling them to heal and smite in equal measure.
Forged by a sly mastermind, this ring embodies the essence of a cunning joker. It allows its wearer to twist fate in their favor, enabling the use of clever tricks and tactics.
A sinister artifact once adorned by a Mind Flayer. Granting its wearer access to telepathic abilities and immense psychic power.

Crafted deep within the heart of the Githyanki's astral enclaves. Grants its wearer the ability to command the very essence of the battlefield. This ancient relic carries the weight of countless battles, where Githyanki champions have harnessed its power to transcend the ordinary.
A vile artifact. Thrives on the whispers of the dead, granting its bearer the dread powers of vampirism, including life-draining abilities.

This meticulously crafted ring resonates with the thunderous might of the gods, bearing the divine blessings of the gods. When worn, it grants enhanced lightning affinity, allowing the wearer to invoke the thunderous power and unleash the tempest's wrath upon their foes.
Crafted amid the desolate tundras of Icewind Dale. Carries the essence of its frigid birthplace, allowing its wearer wield the relentless power of winter's fury.

Once wielded by a prominent leader among the "Absolute" cult. Forged through forbidden and blood-soaked rituals, it grants its possessor mastery over necrotic energies, becoming an accursed symbol of the leader's malevolent reign, casting a shadow of despair upon all who cross their path.

An exquisitely crafted ring which serves as a testament to the power of the mind. Enhance the wearer's mental and mystical prowess, a true symbol of mastery over unseen forces and a potent tool for combat.

An artifact of infernal supremacy, once wielded by the unyielding Lord of Flames, it grants mastery over hellish flames and commands the incendiary fury of the abyss. With this infernal might, you summon a dread ally, ready to serve and unleash devastating power upon the battlefield.
A primal relic of sheer force. Bolsters its possessor's physical prowess, imbuing them with the raw might and resilience reminiscent of a formidable hill giant.

A treasured relic, was created by an ancient circle of revered healers. It radiates with profound healing capabilities, serving as a symbol of hope and restoration. It embodies the unwavering dedication of those who seek to mend the wounds of the world across the ages.

A talisman of blazing power, was worn by a powerful Firewalker as a symbol of mastery over the flames, it serves as a testament to the control and discipline of its bearer. Grants the ability to wield the flames with precision and finesse.

A mysterious and potent relic of unknown origin, this enigmatic talisman confers upon its possessor a diverse range of mystical abilities, serving as a bridge between the veiled domains of nature and the enigmatic arcane realms.

Forged in reverence to the legendary ranger Drizzt Do'Urden, this amulet bestows formidable prowess upon its wearer, allowing them to summon loyal companions and attain mastery over Drizzt's renowned arsenal. It stands as a testament to Drizzt's indomitable legacy, infusing its possessor with the unwavering spirit of a true ranger.

Once worn by a legendary hero, a mighty guardian of nature. Grants its wearer the ability to shift forms and harness the very essence of nature's power. A symbol of the deep bond between its wearer and nature's untamed forces.

Forged in the heart of the Absolute's inner sanctum, this sinister amulet carries with it a legacy steeped in darkness. It is a somber relic that attests to the unwavering loyalty of a true soul who dedicated themselves to the Absolute's cause, channeling the cult's relentless might through this malevolent artifact. "Praise The Absolute!"

A revered relic passed down through generations of witchers. Forged with ancient craftsmanship and enchanted with the ability to detect monsters and magic, it signifies the wearer's commitment to hunting down the supernatural and the unknown.

Within the depths of this hidden trove, an array of enchanting rings and amulets awaits discovery. Each possesses the potential to bestow upon its wearer unparalleled mystical prowess. These relics, steeped in the magic of Eldertide Armament, hold the key to unlocking untold power and secrets, offering a tantalizing allure to those who dare to seek their might.

Once the prized possession of the enigmatic Tasha, exudes an aura of arcane authority. Those who wear the amulet may find themselves blessed with enhanced magical prowess, but with such empowerment comes the ever-present whisper of Tasha's influence, a subtle reminder of the witch queen's enduring presence in the artifact.

Magical book filled with Tasha's curated elixirs and potions. Unlock the secrets of mystical concoctions, from healing remedies to potent enhancements. A must-have for alchemists seeking the touch of the enigmatic witch herself.

Dear Alchemists and Seekers of Magic,
Within these pages, I share the alchemical secrets that have danced in the cauldron of my creation. Tasha's Compendium of Alchemical Arts unveils a gallery of elixirs, each a manifestation of my arcane endeavors. May these recipes ignite your own magical pursuits and awaken the alchemist within.
Brew with wonder, Tasha.

Elixir of Eldertide: Blast - Divine Bone Shard
Elixir of Eldertide: Rupture - Black Oleander
Elixir of Eldertide: Eruption - Chasm Creeper
Elixir of Charismatic Brilliance - Planetar Feather
Elixir of Unleashed Chaos - Nothic Eye
Elixir of Obscure Necrosis - Night Orchid
Potion of Terrain Traversal - Acorn Truffle
Quicksilver Strike Elixir - Mergrass
Potion of Critical Favor - Unicorn Horn
Potion of Prismatic Deflection - Imp Patagium
Potion of Balefire - Yellow Musk Creeper Petals
Lifewarden Elixir - Pegasus Feather
Elixir of Dawnshade - Shadowroot Sac
Elixir of the Gods - Belladonna
Potion of the Thunder Giant - Cloud Giant Finger
Potion of the Archmagi - Dragon Egg Mushroom

Within the hallowed pages of this mystical tome, protected by the realm's most formidable and loyal heroes, lies a repository of arcane secrets. Unravel its knowledge to discover the hidden lore of powerful artifacts, and seize the opportunity to embark on a journey in search of higher power.

In the ancient days of the Forgotten Realms, a collection of mystical artifacts emerged, known as the Eldertide Armaments. Each item held a fragment of ancient arcane might, possessing unparalleled magical prowess. However, as the ages unfolded, the artifacts were scattered across the realms, hidden to safeguard their incredible power.

Whispers of the Eldertide Armaments spread through the ages, captivating the hearts of adventurers and scholars alike. Tales of untold abilities, unparalleled strengths, and the promise of unimaginable magic fueled the desire to reunite the scattered artifacts.

Legends spoke of a mystical ring, said to channel the very power of the thunder god. A ring steeped in the essence of Avernus, beckoned to those seeking both power and peril. Alongside them, an enigmatic amulet, adorned with the symbols of flickering flames, It was said that the amulet allowed the wearer to harness the essence of fire, becoming a firewalker. Yet, the locations of these artifacts remained obscured, lost in the annals of time.

As the seeker of lost knowledge, your destiny intertwines with the Eldertide Armaments. The weave of magic calls out to you, urging you to embark on a perilous journey. Unravel the mysteries of the past, navigate the forgotten realms, and heed the whispers of power that echo through the ages. The Eldertide Armaments await, scattered yet united in their call to a chosen soul—will you be the one to answer?
Weathered pages from the journal of Thaddeus Shadowthorn, a Warlock bound by the Pact of the Great Old One, seeking the Eldertide Armaments.

As ink gracefully meets parchment, I embark on a perilous journey into the heart of the Forgotten Realms, in search of the elusive Eldertide Armaments. Whispers of their power have beckoned to my arcane senses, and the time has come to unravel the mysteries hidden across this legendary realm.

A cryptic map, obtained from a mysterious figure in a dimly lit Waterdeep tavern, serves as my guide.
Weathered pages from the journal of Thaddeus Shadowthorn, a Warlock bound by the Pact of the Great Old One, seeking the Eldertide Armaments.

Navigating through challenges in the Sword Coast's forests and the Anauroch Desert, I stumbled upon a revelation in Myth Drannor that hints at one of the Eldertide Armaments sacred relics - The Ring of Ethereal Phantoms.

Amidst the pursuit, a Deathbringer, an elite warrior of Bhaal, appeared. The struggle intensified as we clashed. In the shadowy ruins, a fierce battle unfolded, culminating in a powerful Eldritch Blast as I drew power from my patron, crumbling my enemy to dust. The echoes mark a decisive moment in my quest for Eldertide Armaments, where danger, enlightenment, and a certainty that this wasn't my final battle in the search for those forgotten relics.
Weathered pages from the journal of Thaddeus Shadowthorn, a Warlock bound by the Pact of the Great Old One, seeking the Eldertide Armaments.

In the heart of Myth Drannor, my search reached a dead end. Despite being filled with encounters and discoveries, my journey concluded with a heavy heart.

The Eldertide Armaments remain elusive, slipping through my grasp like ethereal wisps in the bustling city of Waterdeep. The rumors, once promising, now echo with the hollow resonance of disappointment.

Were these artifacts ever more than mere whispers and fantasies within the realms of Faerûn? The journal bears witness to my quest's end, leaving me to reflect upon the nature of my pursuit and the elusive history of these artifacts.
Frayed entries disclose the journey of Sir Darian Ironheart, a Paladin sworn to the Oath of Vengeance in his righteous pursuit for the Eldertide.

With unwavering faith in the divine, I embark on a sacred quest to seek the Eldertide Armaments within the vast lands of the Forgotten Realms. Clad in armor, sword at my side, the journey commences. A celestial guide whispered of an ancient prophecy, foretelling the convergence of destinies and the revelation of powerful artifacts amidst the diverse landscapes of Faerûn. The divine light guides my steps as I set forth on this holy pilgrimage.
Frayed entries disclose the journey of Sir Darian Ironheart, a Paladin sworn to the Oath of Vengeance in his righteous pursuit for the Eldertide.

Amid ancient carvings, a celestial sigil reveals a potential Eldertide Armaments relic deep within the Underdark's labyrinthine depths.

In the heart of the Underdark, I face a beholder, dodging its destructive magic with unwavering faith. With celestial powers by my side, I exploit a hidden vulnerability, defeating the beholder. Now, standing victorious, I press forward toward the Eldertide Armaments concealed in the subterranean abyss.

Yet, the divine whispers remain cryptic, answers eluding me. Each step forward tests my resolve, but I maintain my faith.
Frayed entries disclose the journey of Sir Darian Ironheart, a Paladin sworn to the Oath of Vengeance in his righteous pursuit for the Eldertide.

Despite my devout quest, the Eldertide Armaments remain hidden within the sacred tapestry of the divine plan amidst the vast realms of Faerûn. Disappointment settles like a heavy cloud upon my soul. I close this chapter of my journey with reflection, pondering the will of the divine and the mysteries that elude even the most steadfast champions.
Worn manuscripts divulge the odyssey of Lyra Emberflame, a sorceress bearing the Draconic Bloodline, in search of the Eldertide Armaments.

In the arcane glow of my study in the city of Silverymoon, I embark on a journey to unravel the mysteries of the Eldertide Armaments. My sorcerous instincts, drawn to the mystical, lead me through the bustling streets of Baldur's Gate, following the cryptic threads of rumor and legend. A tattered grimoire acquired from a curious merchant in Waterdeep contains whispers of untold power, beckoning me to explore unseen realms and unveil hidden secrets.
Worn manuscripts divulge the odyssey of Lyra Emberflame, a sorceress bearing the Draconic Bloodline, in search of the Eldertide Armaments.

Guided by arcane whispers, my journey winds through perilous terrains and ancient libraries, navigating from the lore-laden archives of Candlekeep to the menacing towers of Thay. Within the Library of the Lady in Selûne's Light, a revelation surfaces - a forgotten manuscript hints at the possible location of the Firewalker's Talisman, one of the Eldertide Armaments, concealed beneath the ruins of an ancient underground fire temple located in the high mountains.

My adventure takes me through towering peaks and treacherous landscapes, each step echoing with the whispering winds. The journey takes a more perilous turn as I venture into the smoldering territory guarded by a fierce red dragon.

The trail to the ancient fire temple leads me to the heart of a red dragon's lair. With the looming presence of the majestic creature, I patiently await the opportune moment, slipping through shadows to avoid direct confrontation. Deep within the lair, amidst echoing roars and the glow of molten gold, I discover a fiery ember. Its radiant warmth signals my proximity to the Firewalker's Talisman.
Worn manuscripts divulge the odyssey of Lyra Emberflame, a sorceress bearing the Draconic Bloodline, in search of the Eldertide Armaments.

The pinnacle of my arcane odyssey is marked by a bittersweet moment. I finally lay hands on the coveted Firewalker's Talisman, one of the Eldertide Armaments. The thrill of accomplishment courses through me as the ancient artifact graces my grasp, promising untold power.

Yet, my triumph is short-lived. The red dragon, concealed in the shadows, springs forth with a surprise attack. In a brave but desperate struggle, I face the ferocity of the dragon's onslaught. Amidst the fiery chaos of our encounter, the Talisman slips from my fingers, plummeting into the abyss, lost once again to the annals of time.

The dragon's assault intensifies, and in a daring escape, I narrowly evade its wrath. The Eldertide Armaments, once within my possession, now lies obscured in the unknown depths. I emerge battered but alive, one of the fortunate few to have held the elusive relic.

As I recount the tale, the taste of disappointment mingles with the pride of holding the Firewalker's Talisman, a fleeting encounter with the arcane wonders that elude the grasp of even the most intrepid seekers.
As you hold the vial, a shimmering liquid swirls within, embodying the swiftness of quicksilver. It seems to anticipate your movements, promising precision in strikes and agility.
When consumed, gain a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and Dexterity Saving Throws, alongside an increase in <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>.

The affected entity moves with unparalleled grace, gaining a +2 bonus to both <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and Dexterity Saving Throws, character <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is increased.
A vial shimmering with an uncanny precision, almost predicting your every move.
After consumption, you gain a 1d4 bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, reducing the number needed to score a critical hit by 1.
Affected entity experience heightened agility, gaining 1d4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and the threshold for landing a critical hit is lowered by 1.
A myriad of hues suspended, as if it harbors the very spectrum itself.

When consumed, a portion of incoming damage directed at you are refracted and deflected back toward the attacker. Increasing your Armour Class by 2.

Replaces the effects of other Eldertide elixirs upon consumption.
The affected entity gains the ability to partially reflect incoming damage, returning 1d6 damage back at the attacker. Increases your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 2
A spectral inferno waiting to be unleashed.
After consumption, your main melee weapon ignites with ethereal fire, dealing extra fire damage.
The affected entity's main melee weapon becomes imbued with spectral flames, dealing extra [1].
This weapon deals additional fire damage.
As you gaze upon this swirling elixir, it seems to pulse with vitality, promising restoration and resilience.
Recover [1] and stops <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>, regenerate [2] at turn start, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Constitution Saving Throws.
Affected entity regain [1] at the start of turn.
Swirling with ethereal hues, this elixir captivates with the delicate balance between light and shadow.

Grants immunity to fear, and gains Resistance to both radiant and necrotic damage.

Replaces the effects of other Eldertide elixirs upon consumption.
The affected entity can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> and has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to both radiant and necrotic damage.
A manifestation of divine power coursing through your mortal form.

Raise all of your Ability Scores to a minimum of 20.

Replaces the effects of other Eldertide elixirs upon consumption.
Raise all of your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityScore">Ability Scores</LSTag> to minimum [1].
As you hold this potion, the air around it crackles with electrifying energy, a miniature storm encapsulated in a glass vessel.

Grow in size, granting temporary hit points and Resistance to physical damage. Attacks you make unleash a thunderous explosion.

Replaces the effects of other Eldertide elixirs upon consumption.

The affected entity is Enlarged and gains temporary hit points equal to one-fourth of its maximum hit points, along with <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Physical damage. Attacks you make deals additional [1] in a [2] radius.
Glimmering with arcane potential, this potion whispers secrets of the highest magic.

Replenishes up to level 3 spell slots. Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and Saving Throws against spells and magical effects.

You've restored up to level 3 spell slots, have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and on Saving Throws against spells and magical effects.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Saving Throws against spells and magical effects.
This potent and magical elixir crackles with an ethereal light, whispering ancient Eldertide incantations.

Modifies Eldertide Armaments projectile spells, forcefully pushing affected targets up to [1] away from you.

Replaces effects of other 'Elixirs of Eldertide' upon consumption.
Grants Eldertide projectile spells the ability to push affected targets [1] away from you.
When you hit a creature with Eldertide spells, you can push the creature up to [1] away from you.

The effect applies to the following Eldertide spells: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_FingerOfDeath">Finger of Death</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_CataclysmBlast">Cataclysm Blast</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_JudgmentBolt">Judgment Bolt</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_ShadowsRetribution">Shadows Retribution</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_Annihilation">Annihilation</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_RayOfTheInfernalPhoenix">Ray of the Infernal Phoenix</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_BewitchingBolt">Bewitching Bolt</LSTag>.
Within this mystical elixir resides the essence of primordial Eldertide magic, a tempest that rends the fabric of reality, leaving echoes of rupture in its wake.

Modifies Eldertide Armaments projectile spells, causing affected targets to suffer an additional [1] upon impact.

Replaces effects of other 'Elixirs of Eldertide' upon consumption.
Grants Eldertide projectile spells the ability to deal an extra [1] upon impact.
When you hit a creature with Eldertide spells, you deal extra [1].

The effect applies to the following Eldertide spells: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_FingerOfDeath">Finger of Death</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_CataclysmBlast">Cataclysm Blast</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_JudgmentBolt">Judgment Bolt</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_ShadowsRetribution">Shadows Retribution</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_Annihilation">Annihilation</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_RayOfTheInfernalPhoenix">Ray of the Infernal Phoenix</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_BewitchingBolt">Bewitching Bolt</LSTag>.
A potent and condensed force of Eldertide lies dormant within this elixir, ready to unleash havoc upon impact.

Modifies Eldertide Armaments projectile spells, triggering an explosion that deals [1] in a [2] radius upon impact.

Replaces effects of other 'Elixirs of Eldertide' upon consumption.
Grants Eldertide projectile spells the ability to trigger an explosion that deals [1] in a [2] radius.
When you hit a creature with Eldertide spells, it triggers an explosion that deals [1] in a [2] radius.

The effect applies to the following Eldertide spells: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_FingerOfDeath">Finger of Death</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_CataclysmBlast">Cataclysm Blast</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_JudgmentBolt">Judgment Bolt</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_ShadowsRetribution">Shadows Retribution</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_Annihilation">Annihilation</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_RayOfTheInfernalPhoenix">Ray of the Infernal Phoenix</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="ELDER_Projectile_BewitchingBolt">Bewitching Bolt</LSTag>.
Triggers a [2] radius explosion that deals [1].
Crafted from rare herbs and blessed by nature's spirits, this elixir radiates a calming aura, swirling with hues of green and brown.
Grants immunity to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>.
Affected entity has immunity to the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, allowing free movement regardless of environmental hindrances.
Infused with flickering sparks of untamed energy, this elixir seems to pulse erratically, promising unpredictable yet potent effects.
When attacked, you can use your reaction to unleash a wild magic surge upon your attacker.
When attacked, you can trigger a wild magic surge, releasing unpredictable magical effects against the attacker.
Creates an eruption of electricity and lightning.
When a foe hits you with a spell attack, you can use your reaction and unleash Wild Magic Surge uppon the attacker.
Target an enemy spellcaster. They will unleash a wild magic surge on themselves.
A shadowed essence, foreboding and potent, swirls within this vial, emits an ominous aura, shrouded in whispers of the undead.

Your melee attacks deal extra [1] when attacking from obscured areas.

Replaces the effects of other Eldertide elixirs upon consumption.
Provides additional [1] to melee attacks when striking from obscured areas.
While in obscured areas your melee attacks deal additional [1].
A blending of rare herbs with ethereal essence, this elixir shimmers with a captivating aura.
Grants proficiency in all charisma skills and a +2 bonus to charisma.
Affected entity gains proficiency in all charisma skills and a +2 bonus to charisma.
Calls upon celestial energy to heal and renew, mending wounds and restoring vitality.
A superior healing spell of immense power, allowing you to channel your healing energy into a focused beam of rejuvenation.
Unleash a sudden and intense burst of psychic energy, damaging all nearby enemies within your radius.
Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Restores a fellow party member to full health, an immensely potent ability that can shift the tide of the battle.
Unleash a flurry of [2] blazing, high-powered projectiles, each dealing [1]. They always find their mark.
Unleash a white pillar of radiant and necrotic fire, a fusion of holy and profane energies.
Channel the fierce, unending might of the infernal phoenix, unleashing a searing ray of fire. Inflicts [1] and engulfs the target in flames.
Conjure a Defensive barrier that makes creatures and objects inside it <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to all damage.
Harness the might of the hells in battle as you beckon forth a fiendish ally.
Form a vengeful pact and summon Drakthul, the formidable Half-Demon warrior, as your loyal companion who will wield his malevolent might to aid you in your fights.
Forge a dark covenant and summon Ravenna, the mighty Half-Demon Protector, as your unwavering companion who will channel her infernal powers support you in your endeavors.
Enter into a sinister pact and conjure Mizora, an otherworldly Half-Demon, as a steadfast companion who will harness her demonic abilities to assist you in your endeavors.
Gains a +1d4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
When you eliminate an enemy using a melee attack, shroud yourself in a veil of darkness, rendering you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBILITY">Invisible</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Channel the arcane might within you to conjure [1] colossal, crimson, crackling energy beam(s), capable of unleashing a devastating surge of force that deals [2].

The target's defenses are compromised, resulting in a reduction of their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> by 2 and their <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> is lowered by 3.
Summon the fearsome beasts to stand vigil by your side in the heat of battle, reinforcing your ranks with an indomitable force.
Summon Guenhwyvar, the Ethereal Feline Companion to aid you in your adventures.
Scratch a target with a powerful attack.
Embrace the legacy of Drizzt, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with scimitars, daggers and longbows.
You gain a +[1] bonus to Spell Attack Rolls and Spell Save DC.
Grants you <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage and empowers your weapon attacks with an additional [1].
Tap into your ancestral animal heritage by entering a primal trance that lets you transform into various creatures, gaining their unique abilities and enhancing your adaptability
As your bond with shifting forms intensifies, you gain the ability to rapidly heal and rejuvenate, bolstering your resilience in the heat of battle.
Tap into your shapeshifting affinity to mend minor wounds, demonstrating your growing control over form and healing.
Unleash your shapeshifting prowess to heal injuries more effectively, showcasing your mastery over the connection between form and healing.
Channel your profound mastery of shapeshifting to mend severe wounds, showcasing your unparalleled control over the symbiotic relationship between form and healing.
Grants <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with Martial Weapons, Light Armor and Medium Armor.
Awaken your primal instincts and unleash your inner beast to Gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FERAL_SWIFTNESS">Feral Swiftness</LSTag>.

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> and jump distance is doubled, and it can take one additional action per turn.
Assume the shape of a Black bear that can Goad enemies into attacking it.
Channel the unwavering devotion of the Absolute cult, bringing forth loyal followers who stand ready to serve their dark and mysterious cause.
Summon Dror Ragzlin, the fearsome hobgoblin barbarian whose unwavering loyalty to the cult is equaled only by his relentless and untamed might.
Summon True Soul Nere, the formidable sorcerer of the Absolute cult, whose mastery of arcane forces is surpassed only by his unwavering dedication to the cult's cause.
Summon Minthara, the devout servant of Lolth and resolute commander within the Absolute cult, whose unwavering faith in her dual oaths bolsters her allies and strikes fear into her enemies.
Summon Marcus, the darkly devoted paladin in the service of the Absolute, whose necrotic power and unwavering allegiance strengthen your cause and sow dread among your foes.
Grants <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with Martial Weapons, Light Armor, Medium Armor and Heavy Armor.
Has a 1d4 penalty to Attack Rolls and Saving Throws.
Harness the force of Aard to release a powerful gust of wind from your hand dealing [1], knocking back and potentially making foes in front of you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Channel the power of Igni to unleash devastating flames from your hand. engulfing your target or area in searing flames, dealing [1].

Invoke the protective magic of Quen to create a shimmering force shield around yourself. Grants you 20 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Slashing, Piercing and Bludgeoning. While Quen is active, those who strike you will endure [1].

Create a magic seal on the ground. When a creature enters the seal, they take [1] and [2]. The targets must succeed on a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Only one yrden seal can be active at a time.
Utilize the mesmerizing power of Axii to temporarily <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charm</LSTag> an enemy, causing them to become friendly and fight by your side.

Granting 20 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Slashing, Piercing, and Bludgeoning damage. Those who dare to attack you while the shield is active will suffer [1].

Your body, fortified through the Trial of the Grasses, grants you <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison damage. You gain +4 bonus to initiative rolls.

Channel your signs into your weapon, forging it into a conduit of untamed elemental forces. Your strikes manifest as surges of arcane power, dealing 1d4 damage of your chosen type.

Your weapon has been infused with energy, attacks with this weapon deal extra damage.

Throughout the next 3 rounds, the affected target regains [1] at the start of each round.

If the enemy fails its saving throw against the spell, it becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDNESS">Blind</LSTag>.

Evoke a chilling tempest of ice and frost to descend from the sky, blanketing the earth and striking all objects and creatures within its range.

Invoke the icy arts of the cryomancer and brand a target with a shimmering sigil of frost. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they suffer <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FROSTBITE">Frostbite</LSTag>.

The target's movement speed is halved as the icy chill of the mark hinders their mobility. The target becomes <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Cold damage, and have <LSTag Tooltip="Disdvantage">Disdvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

Conjures an ever-changing dome, filled with mischievous energy. You utter a guttural, Githyanki incantation, focusing your energy on a single target. If the target has [1] hit points or fewer, it dies instantly. If it has more than [1] hit points, it takes 55-100 Damage.
Draw upon your profound connection to the Astral Plane, summoning forth fierce and devoted Githyanki warriors to stand by your side.
Channeling your psionic energy, you invoke the presence of Orpheus, the Githyanki Prince. A true guardian of the Astral Plane, to guide you in your path.
Drawing upon the eldritch might within you, you beckon Thalos, the formidable Githyanki Warlock, to stand with you in battle. A master of otherworldly invocations and eldritch knowledge.
With a focused invocation, you call upon Kythra, the formidable Githyanki Eldritch Knight, to join your side in the heat of battle. A master of martial combat and arcane magic.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Physical, Lightning and Thunder damage. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">saves</LSTag>.

Draw upon the divine favor of Eir as it mends your wounds and heals you.
Leap down unto a foe, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. You won't take falling damage. You must be above your target.
Charge forward with thunderous speed and unbridled force, attacking all enemies in the way and possibly knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to necrotic damage. <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Fear</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> effects hold no sway over you. Turned into solid gold. Incapacitated and unable to move or take actions, bonus actions, or reactions.
Wield the might of creation and make a wish to restore an expended resource of your choosing or to grant upon you certain benefits.
Eliminate any current curses and hexes that have taken hold of you.
